tool_description: Api for all things in the Avatar (the last airbender) universe
name: Avatar Universe Api
title: Avatar Universe Api

api_list.name: CharactersController_findAvatars
CharactersController_findRandom
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://avatar-universe-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/characters/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "avatar-universe-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
